transArray.content: Excellent location, convenient transportation, very good service, very in place

Hello dear guest! Thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and leaving a 5-point review. The hotel is located on the West Fourth Ring Road, with very convenient transportation. It is very close to the 301 Hospital and the subway and bus stations. The hotel also provides free electronic parking tickets for travel. The route can be diversified according to your travel mode. At the same time, the room is equipped with complete facilities, electric curtains, refrigerated small refrigerator, and the hotel is equipped with double-layer soundproof glass. It is located on the West Fourth Ring Road side. Closing the internal and external windows can reduce external noise. For guests who sleep lightly, the front desk prepares disposable earplugs for your use. If you have any questions during your check-in, please dial "9" on the room phone to call the front desk. Our friends will definitely handle it for you. What's the best? You can also provide feedback with your comments or suggestions. We hope that with your support we will do better. We look forward to your stay again and wish you a happy life! Manager: Zhao Dan
